sgcool_label_text:This photograph is a portrait of Seah Liang Seah. Printed on the card is the studio mark ‘G R Lambert \u0026 Co.’. \r\n\r\nSeah Liang Seah was a prominent leader of the Teochew community
 one of the founding members of the Straits Chinese British Association
 and successor to Whampoa on the Straits Legislative Council
 to name but a few of his accomplishments. He was the son of the early Teochew leader Seah Eu Chin.\r\n

metadata.sgcool_label_text:
This photograph is a portrait of Seah Liang Seah. Printed on the card is the studio mark ‘G R Lambert & Co.’. 

Seah Liang Seah was a prominent leader of the Teochew community, one of the founding members of the Straits Chinese British Association, and successor to Whampoa on the Straits Legislative Council, to name but a few of his accomplishments. He was the son of the early Teochew leader Seah Eu Chin.
